content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Automation Science Pack Production Line at position(8.5, 13.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Assembling machine 1 (position 8.5, 13.5)
- Output inserter (burner inserter at 10.5, 13.5)
- Output chest (wooden chest at 11.5, 13.5)
- Iron gear input system:
  - Input chest (wooden chest at 7.5, 17.5)
  - Input inserter (burner inserter at 7.5, 16.5)
- Copper plate input system:
  - Input chest (wooden chest at 9.5, 19.5)
  - Input inserter (burner inserter at 9.5, 18.5)
- Stone furnace (position 14.0, 14.0)

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine (position -4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler (position -4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump (position -3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe groups (fluid systems 4279, 4281)
- Electric pole network connecting various entities

### Mining and Smelting Operations
Multiple mining and smelting setups at different locations:
- Mining setup 1:
  - Burner mining drill (41.0, -82.0)
  - Chest (41.5, -80.5)
  - Burner inserter (41.5, -79.5)
- Mining setup 2:
  - Burner mining drill (-28.0, -61.0)
  - Chest (-27.5, -59.5)
  - Burner inserter (-26.5, -59.5)
  - Stone furnace (-25.0, -59.0)
  - Output chest (-22.5, -58.5)
- Mining setup 3:
  - Burner mining drill (-18.0, -53.0)
  - Input chest (-17.5, -51.5)
  - Burner inserter (-16.5, -51.5)
  - Stone furnace (-15.0, -51.0)
  - Output chest (-12.5, -50.5)

### Transport System
Belt network consisting of 11 belts connecting various parts of the factory, running from position (8.5, 11.5) to (1.5, 14.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Conflicts
- Check for existing entities before placing new ones at a location
- When placing entities next to existing ones, ensure proper spacing and direction to avoid collisions
- Consider using different directions or increasing spacing when placement fails

### Direction Errors
- NORTHWEST is not a valid direction - use only the cardinal and intercardinal directions available in the Direction enum

### Resource Management
- Ensure required items are in inventory before attempting to insert them into containers
- Craft required items before attempting to use them in production
- Check for stone furnace availability before attempting to place one

### Entity Blocking
- When inserters are waiting for space, ensure there is a proper destination/sink object at the drop location
- Verify the entire production chain has proper input/output connections

### Fuel Management
- Multiple burner mining drills are reported as out of fuel - implement proper fuel distribution system
- Keep burner inserters fueled to maintain production flow
